Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts13R.name: ResultClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts13R.abstract: The ResultClosure is used by other Codable aliases when responding with only a RequestError is needed.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts20C.name: CodableResultClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts20C.abstract: The CodableResultClosure is used by other Codable aliases when responding with an object which conforms to Codable, or a RequestError is needed.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts25C.name: CodableArrayResultClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts25C.abstract: The CodableArrayResultClosure is used by other Codable aliases when responding with an array of objects which conform to Codable, or a RequestError is needed.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts35I.name: IdentifierCodableArrayResultClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts35I.abstract: The IdentifierCodableArrayResultClosure is used by other Codable aliases when responding with an array of tuples containing an identifier and a Codable object, or a RequestError.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts30I.name: IdentifierCodableResultClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts30I.abstract: This is used to perform a series of actions which use an object conforming to Identifier and an object conforming to Codable. After which you want to respond with an object which conforms to Codable, which is of the same type as the object passed as a parameter, or respond with an Identifier or RequestError.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts24I.name: IdentifierCodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts24I.abstract: The IdentifierCodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions utilising an object conforming to Identifier and an object conforming to ‘Codable’, then respond with an object which conforms to Codable, which is of the same type as the object passed as a parameter, or responding with a RequestError in the form of a CodableResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts14C.name: CodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts14C.abstract: The CodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions utilising an object conforming to Identifier, then respond with an object which conforms to Codable, which is of the same type as the object passed as a parameter, or responding with a RequestError in the form of a CodableResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts24C.name: CodableIdentifierClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts24C.abstract: The CodableIdentifierClosure is used to perform a series of actions utilising an object conforming to Identifier, then respond with an object which conforms to Codable, and/or an object conforming to Identifier or responding with a RequestError in the form of a IdentifierCodableResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts17N.name: NonCodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts17N.abstract: The NonCodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions then respond with a RequestError in the form of a ResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts27I.name: IdentifierNonCodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts27I.abstract: The IdentifierNonCodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions utilising an object which conforms to Identifier, then respond with a RequestError in the form of a ResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts19C.name: CodableArrayClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts19C.abstract: The CodableArrayClosure is used to perform a series of actions then respond with an array of objects conforming to Codable or a RequestError in the form of a CodableArrayResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts29I.name: IdentifierCodableArrayClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts29I.abstract: The IdentifierCodableArrayClosure is used to perform a series of actions then respond with an array of tuples containing an identifier and a Codable object, or a RequestError, in the form of a IdentifierCodableArrayResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts20S.name: SimpleCodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts20S.abstract: The SimpleCodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions, then respond with an object conforming to Codable or a RequestError in the form of a CodableResultClosure.

Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts30I.name: IdentifierSimpleCodableClosure
Typealiases.html#/s:15KituraContracts30I.abstract: The IdentifierSimpleCodableClosure is used to perform a series of actions utilising an object which conforms to Identifier, then respond with an object conforming to Codable or a RequestError in the form of a CodableResultClosure.

Indicates whether two URLs are the same.

Structs/BodyFormat.html#/s:15KituraContr.name: type
Structs/BodyFormat.html#/s:15KituraContr.abstract: A String value of the type that the body format will be represented in, which is used to ensure that both the left-hand side and the right-hand side are of the same type in the response body.
This function checks that both the left-hand side and the right-hand side of the response body are of the same type.

Classes/Coder.html.name: Coder
Classes/Coder.html.abstract: Class defining shared resources for the QueryDecoder and QueryEncoder.

Classes/QueryDecoder.html.name: QueryDecoder
Classes/QueryDecoder.html.abstract: Query Parameter Decoder decodes a [String: String] object to a Decodable object instance. The decode function takes the Decodable object as a parameter to decode the dictionary into.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
